hr.fer.zemris.java.hw11.jnotepadpp.localization

Interface ILocalizationListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChangeCaseAction, CloseAction, CloseAllAction, CopyAction, CutAction, DeleteAction, ExitAction, InvertCaseAction, JNotepadPP, LanguageSelectAction, LocalizableAction, LocalizableLabel, LocalizableMenu, LocalizationProviderBridge, NewFileAction, OpenAction, PasteAction, SaveAction, SaveAsAction, SelectAllAction, SortAction, SortAscendingAction, SortDescendingAction, StatisticsAction, ToLowerCaseAction, ToUpperCaseAction, UniqueAction

    public interface ILocalizationListener
    Enables the implementing classes to act as listeners for ILocalizationProvider implementing classes. To subscribe to a provider a listener should use addLocalizationListener() method with reference to it passes as a reference. Same for unsubbing.
    Author:
    Peda

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void localizationChanged()
      Called to revalidate the localization recieved.

      • localizationChanged

        void localizationChanged()
        Called to revalidate the localization recieved.
